ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:50:28 [Issue ID 4000-825077] urn:comicvine:4000-825077 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 01:52:14. [Issue ID 2186105]
ComicInfo.Summary: Knowing they now have a cure for those infected by the zombie virus, the heroes must stop an army of Amazos from destroying the unliving before they can be restored to life. Meanwhile, Constantine has acquired the powers of other magic-based heroes to go up against Trigon who is planning to take over the world.
